title: Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream: Every person tries hard for one day to get married, bear the responsibility, and complete the second half of his religion in marriage, and the first step to marriage is engagement, and the engagement period may be a few days and it may also be months or years, and this is related to the circumstances and the agreement of the two parties to marry. However, the marriage ceremony and the books of the book are according to the Sunnah of God Almighty and some may see the engagement in a dream and search for it. An explanation for this vision, so in this article today we will learn about the interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream. The interpretation of getting engaged in a dream is one of the most common dreams that people see. The dreamer may get married and see that he is engaged again. The person in the dream Today we will present to you the encyclopedia of interpretation of engagement in a dream in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing engagement in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer sees that he is engaged to a girl in a dream, this indicates that he will achieve what he aspires to in life. If he sees that he is engaged to a married woman, this indicates that he will not get what he wants. Life, prosperity, happiness and joy. If the dreamer sees that he is engaged, this means that he will marry a man who has a high status in society, but if he sees himself at an engagement party, this indicates that the groom is not suitable for her and she must reject him. . . Whoever sees himself at an engagement party, rejoicing and rejoicing, this indicates that he will obtain what he was looking for, and whoever sees that he is engaged to a divorced or widowed woman, this indicates that he will obtain what he wants. . But after difficulties in his life. Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees an engagement in a dream, and this vision is on Friday, this indicates nourishment, happiness, and kindness. If a girl dreams that she is engaged to her boyfriend, this indicates her strong desire to marry him, and if an unmarried woman sees that she is attending her friend’s engagement while she is already engaged, this indicates. Her fiancé is not suitable for her. Interpretation of the appearance of an engagement in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she sees a dream about a dead person, this indicates the livelihood, kindness, and happiness that she will obtain. It shows that her married life is full of love, stability and harmony. Interpretation of the appearance of an engagement in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that she is dreaming, this means that her birth will be facilitated. Interpretation of the vision of an engagement in a dream for a manIf a man dreams that he is a girl, this means that he is seeking to get rid of the pleasures of life and loneliness, If a man dreams that he is engaged to a beautiful girl, this indicates happiness, food, and kindness. A man saw in a dream that a girl was coming to engage him, and this indicates comfort, happiness, and abundant living. If a man sees in a dream that he is attending an engagement, this indicates that his life will change for the better. . A poor man preaching in a dream, this indicates the approach of his death. In conclusion, he mentions that seeing engagement in a dream is one of the things that pleases a person and gives him good news, and this is what the interpreters have interpreted, but not everything the interpreters say is correct, and of course because he is exactly the interpreter of his opinion, because Only Almighty God knows what is happening

title: Basmalah in a dream or saying Bismillah in a dream

preview.html: Basmala in a dream or saying “In the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful” is one of the most beloved visions, as it is one of the necessities for doing any work, such as seeking livelihood, marriage, and children. . ; May goodness and blessings enter. The basmala in a dream has many connotations and meanings that we will explain in detail in this article, so follow along with us. The basmala in a dream Seeing the basmala in a dream indicates the goodness of the dreamer, his closeness to God Almighty, his religiosity and his commitment. The interpretation of the dream of the basmala in a dream symbolizes the blessing of money and huge livelihood. The interpretation of the basmalah in a dream can be a symbol of the dreamer’s ability to bear responsibility. The basmalah in a dream can be a symbol of removing sadness and removing injustice if the dreamer suffers from injustice or is forced to do so. See also: The saying: There is no power nor strength except with God in the dream is enough. Saying “My Lord, He is the Best Agent” in a dream. Saying “In the Name of God” in a dream. The interpretation of the word “In the Name of God” in a dream is a symbol of stability, living and happiness. Saying the name of God in a dream to a married man is a symbol of the stability of his married life and friendship and love between him and his family. Saying “In the Name of God” in a dream in a merchant’s dream It is a symbol of profitable trade, if he is starting a new project or starting a new business. The interpretation of the dream in which he says in the name of God in a dream for a single person is a symbol of his marriage to a beautiful and reliable girl with good morals. As for saying the Basmala in a dream for a seeker of knowledge, it is good news of success and distinction and that he will obtain High academic grades. Interpretation of a dream about writing in the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful. As for the interpretation of a dream about writing in the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful, it symbolizes positive changes in the dreamer’s life that will bring him kindness and blessings. Interpretation of a dream in which he writes in the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful may be a symbol of solving his problems and relieving him after distress. Perhaps the interpretation The dream in which the name of God, mercy, and mercy is written is the dreamer’s good condition and the fulfillment of his desires. Interpretation of the dream of writing “In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful” in a dream is a symbol of the dreamer’s piety, justice, religiosity, and commitment to the teachings of his religion. As for writing “In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful” in gold, it is a symbol of the dreamer’s preoccupation with matters of religion. And obedience. In the case of writing in the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful, in a foreign language such as Hebrew, Hindi, or other, it indicates the opening of a new door to earning a living for the fortuneteller. As for the interpretation of the dream in which he writes in the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful, with an iron pen, it is a symbol of the strength of a person’s faith and steadfastness in matters of his religion. If it is with a silver pen, it is a symbol of the stability of the fortuneteller’s condition and the balance of his affairs. If you are writing on a white or red board, this is good news for good news or happy events on the way. The interpretation of a dream about writing In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful on green cloth is a symbol of martyrdom. As for the interpretation of a dream about writing In the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful is a problem, as it is a symbol of marriage to a righteous woman. It may be good news for him with a new job or a dream promotion that puts him in a prominent position. Perhaps the interpretation of the dream that he writes in the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful is a symbol of the dreamer earning money or wealth from a known source or place. For him. As for the interpretation of the dream that is written in the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful

title: Marble in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about marble for a married, pregnant, and single woman

preview.html: Dear brothers and sisters, welcome to the dream interpretation website. Our meeting revolves around the interpretation of marble in a dream and the events or scenes accompanying this dream, such as polishing marble or buying and trading it. The article also presents the meaning of colors in a marble dream. This article or interpretation will take two approaches: The first is Islamic by seeing what Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi mentioned in interpreting this symbol. As for the second method, it is followed by the modern or Western school, which relies mainly on the psychological importance of marble or alabaster. In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of marble in the dream of a man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a single woman. We wish everyone an enjoyable and useful continuation of this topic. Interpretation of marble and alabaster in a dream according to Nabulsi. Excerpts From the book: Perfuming people in the interpretation of dreams, at the disposal of the editor. Marble in a dream indicates pride and high status, and in the interpretation it is money, and marble in a dream shows good and just husbands and wives. Whoever sees in a dream something made of marble, he will become independent after his poverty, and marble may indicate If a man or woman marries, he may attain a prestigious status. As for everything made of marble, such as sinks, faucets, faucets, bases, columns, and lintels, this in a dream indicates prosperity or wealth. Good men are women and good men are boys and girls. Perhaps buying marble indicates owning luxurious homes and means of living. As for a luxurious marble cemetery in a dream, it symbolizes a just afterlife, good praise, and justified times. As for marble, which is a piece of another piece, it indicates beautiful writing or a marriage contract with an expensive or expensive dowry. As for the marble or alabaster jar, it indicates the beauty of a woman and her high rank. Interpretation of marble in one dream: If an unmarried girl sees that she is carving marble, or making statues from it, or polishing it, then she may achieve practical success or great profit in waking life. The unmarried girl who dreams By owning a marble or alabaster quarry, she may obtain money from an inheritance, or marry a wealthy man, or her dowry may be valuable. As for an unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is breaking or breaking a slab of marble, in waking life she may face difficulties on the level Emotional or practical. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is walking on a road paved with marble, in her wakefulness she takes a safe path and achieves and achieves what she aspires to or seeks in terms of goals and objectives. If a single woman sees in her dream that she is sitting at a marble or alabaster table, this means A good omen and positive sign that matches her desires and goals at the moment, which means there are chances of success. And she has no choice but to move forward to achieve her goals. Alabaster in a single woman’s dream may indicate the cruelty of the heart of the man to whom her heart is attached. Interpretation of alabaster or marble in a married woman’s dream. Alabaster or white marble in a married woman’s dreams has an emotional connotation, as it is a symbol of compatibility in Feelings between spouses and e

title: Driving a car in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Driving a car for a married woman has more than one interpretation, which will be specified in the following lines, so you should just contact us to find out all the indicators and interpretations related to the vision. Driving a car in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that if a married woman sees in a dream that she wants to buy a car, but she is confused about her choice. And she needs help. The vision shows that she does not have the ability to make decisions on her own. If you see a car in a dream that comes on time and you drive it easily, the dream indicates that you are on time. Achieving all your ambitions and goals. If a woman sees in her dream that she is waiting to drive A car, but it is late, the dream indicates the difficulty of achieving her desires. When the married woman saw that she was driving the car to leave the country for another country, and her husband really wanted to travel. This vision shows the approaching of her husband’s journey and the fulfillment of what he desires. Driving a car in a dream, according to Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is driving a car and it breaks down, then the vision indicates that the dreamer is facing many problems and difficulties. If the dreamer sees that he is in an accident while driving, then the dream indicates that bad news has arrived to the dreamer. In the event that a married woman sees in a dream She is driving a car and while driving, the engine makes loud noises. The vision shows that her married life is stable. If the dreamer sees that he is getting into the car and walking in it quickly, then the vision indicates the fulfillment of his aspirations and dreams. But if the dreamer sees that he is driving slowly, then the vision indicates the difficulty of achieving His dreams. You may be interested: Interpretation of the dream of receiving a gift of a new car. Driving a car in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is buying a new car, then the vision is a harbinger of a close marriage with a good person. But if the girl sees that she is buying an old car and driving it, then The vision indicates a close marriage with a divorced man. And if he sees that he is buying a modern, luxurious car and driving it quickly, the vision shows that he is buying a modern, luxurious car and driving it quickly. A close marriage with a wealthy man who lives a happy life and has a good heart. Seeing her riding with an unknown person in... A large car while driving is evidence of her imminent marriage to him. But if she is in the study stage, the vision indicates her excellence in her work. When a girl sees that she is driving a luxurious black car, the vision indicates that she is successful in her studies and work. But if she sees that she is driving a red car Luxurious, the dream shows that she will marry the one she loves soon and with him she will live the most beautiful life in her life. Driving a car in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is driving a car and walking on dead ends, then the dream indicates marital disputes that lead to her separation from her husband. But If a married woman sees that she is driving a car on a road full of stones and finds it difficult to drive it. The vision indicates the obstacles that she will face in the coming days. Seeing a car breaking down in a dream while driving is a sign that the woman will

title: Interpretation of losing virginity in a dream: Seeing losing virginity in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of losing virginity in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether a membrane was opened by someone I know or an unknown person. Interpretation of losing virginity in a dream: Many girls dream of losing their virginity because of their extreme fear of this happening and their fear of society’s harsh view of a non-virgin woman. If A girl dreamed of herself and lost her virginity, this means that she will get married. If she is a virgin, or that there is good news that she will hear soon, then this is evidence of nourishment and kindness. Removing one’s virginity in a dream also means almost comfort and that there is someone who is pleading with you from his heart. According to psychologists, the girl A virgin who sees in a dream her virginity being destroyed means that she is afraid of this happening, especially since she is in an Arab society that will never have mercy on her. Losing your virginity in a dream also means that you are alone and carrying a heavy burden and do not know who cares about you. It may mean that you will lose something that is dear to you. Breaking the hymen in a dream for girls, divorcees, and widows indicates marriage in most cases. It also indicates the fulfillment of a wish and good news. Losing virginity in a dream accompanied by screaming and resentment could indicate happiness and goodness for the dreamer and those around him. Whoever sees her virginity being dispersed in a dream, it may be... This serves as a warning to her against some practices that may be inconsistent with behavior and morals. Breaking the hymen in a dream for a married and pregnant woman indicates the opening of the doors of sustenance, the renewal of the relationship, the bonds of affection between her husband, and the comfort of matters. She may discover something wrong that she did regarding her husband. As for her who saw that she was trying to break her virginity in the dream with her hand or any tool, the dream may indicate that she was exposed to an accident to her honor or divulged a scandalous secret. Interpretation of the dream of losing virginity according to scholars and experts in psychology according to Ibn Sirin Sheikh Interpreters in Islam, so the interpretation of losing a woman’s virginity in a dream means: Dream of losing your virginity – YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about going to the Maldives in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of going to the Maldives in a dream When you are looking for an interpretation of the dream of going to the Maldives in a dream, it is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are some interpretations that the site explains, citing the interpretations of some scholars working in an attempt to reach the truth. Interpretation of the dream of going to the Islands Maldives in a dream: Seeing traveling to the Maldives in a dream may indicate good skin that the dreamer may gain during those days. Dreaming of going to the Maldives in a dream can indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams of that period. Seeing going to the Maldives in a dream may indicate a person’s desire In fulfilling his desires and dreams. Whoever sees in a dream that he went to the Maldives in a dream can indicate victory over enemies and positive changes that the dreamer obtains during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about going to the sea in a dream: Going to the calm sea in a dream may indicate To the dreamer's good offspring, thanks to God's grace. In the event that one sees that he entered the calm sea, this may indicate a lot of money that the dreamer received at that time. If one sees that he went into the sea, this may indicate the family stability that he had At that time. If one sees that he is bathing in the sea, this may indicate good skin that the dreamer will acquire in the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about moving to joy in a dream: Seeing someone who went out for fun in a new suit may indicate some positive changes that have occurred in His life during this period. Seeing someone could mean that he is about to rejoice. It may indicate that he heard happy news coming to the dreamer in those days. In the case of his personal view that he went to joy and had a lot of music and songs that could indicate the material stumbles that the dreamer faced at that time. The transition to joy, music and singing may It indicates some problems that the dreamer may face during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about going to the market in a dream Going to the market in a dream can indicate a person’s success in his field of work, thanks to God. In the event that a person thinks that he went to the market, this may indicate To a high position that the dreamer reached during this period. Seeing yourself going to the market in a dream may indicate many material gains that the dreamer achieved in those days. If one sees that he went to the market in a dream, this may indicate getting rid of The difficulty that the dreamer faces in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about going to the doctor in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he went to the doctor in a dream, can indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer in those days. Seeing going to the doctor in a dream may indicate a lot Of money and an extensive diet that the dreamer will receive during this time. In the event that in my personal opinion he went to the doctor in a dream, this may indicate upcoming joys for the dreamer in that

title: Interpretation of dreams: My brother works in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that my brother works in a dream A brother is part of the heart, so seeing him has many meanings. Below we present the interpretation of a dream that my brother works in a dream, all of this and more. Interpretation of dreams that my brother works in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that my brother works in a dream. The vision of finding a new job can express the right actions that he does, and God is All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees getting a job in a dream, this may be a sign of goodness and righteous deeds. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a job application and it is accepted in a dream, this may lead to losses, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, work can express anxiety, and God has all knowledge of the unseen. Interpretation of a dream that my brother is arguing with someone in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of my brother arguing with someone in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing a quarrel between two mates in a dream could be a sign of severing the kinship connection, and God knows all that is not seen. If the dreamer sees an argument between two strangers, it may be a sign of competition, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a quarrel with his family In a dream, this may indicate difficulty, and God is Great and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my brother shaving his beard in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my brother shaving his beard in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that the interpretation of a dream about shaving a beard in a dream could be a sign of goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas if the dreamer sees himself shaving his beard in a dream, this could be evidence of freedom from worries and arrogance from illness, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees himself shaving his beard in a dream, this may mean separation and separation, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my brother sad and crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my brother sad and crying in a dream. Seeing someone you know sad could indicate your need to ask, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if the dreamer sees If someone he loves is sad in a dream, this may indicate his need for peace, and God knows all that he does not see. If the dreamer sees a sad father, this may be a sign that his children are not right and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a sad brother in a dream, this may be a sign On the lack of mercy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my brother searching for my phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my brother searching for my cell phone in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that searching for a cell phone in a dream could be evidence of espionage and hatred on the part of a person, and God knows everything that he did not see. Nobody. If the dreamer sees someone searching for his cell phone, this may lead to anxiety and fear for the dreamer, and God knows everything that no one has seen. If a single girl sees someone searching for her cell phone, she can express that someone is watching her and trying to find out her news, and God is Most High. And I know. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the abaya in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an abaya or abaya in a dream. The abaya is one of the clothes that a woman wears and covers and covers the woman’s entire body. Islamic law has set the standards for the legal hijab that protects women from severe exposure to it. A person may dream and see an abaya in a dream, or he may see himself wearing it. And the interpretation of his dream of seeing an abaya or cloak in a dream has different interpretations, which differ depending on the dreamer, so dream interpretation scholars wanted to give appropriate interpretations for this dream. Wearing an abaya in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream wearing an abaya indicates goodness for her, as commentators have put these interpretations Related to this dream: If she sees someone giving her the abaya, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. It also indicates that her children will have a bright future and she will be proud of them. This dream may also indicate her marital happiness. Or it may indicate making excuses for others and forgiving them. If she sees that her husband He gave her the abaya, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. If she is suffering from problems, this is a sign of the collapse of her problems and happiness. It also indicates the righteousness of her husband and family. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing white clothes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a colorful dress for a single woman. When an unmarried woman sees the abaya in her dream, it symbolizes Many things, as the color of the abaya plays a role in it, and the single woman’s status in reality also has an impact on the interpretation of the dream: Ibn Sirin believes that the abaya in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her purity and chastity. It is also good news for her. It may also indicate the imminent Her marriage to a good and pious person. Seeing the abaya also shows the happiness of the dreamer as well as her family. It is also an indication that she will earn a living soon, either through her marriage, or she may find a job. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing black clothes in a dream and its effects. Symbol of the abaya in a dream A pregnant woman’s interpretation of a dream about seeing an abaya: Seeing a pregnant woman wearing an abaya in her dream symbolizes many things and has many meanings, such as: It indicates abundant sustenance, and a lot of money. It is also a sign that her birth will go well. Moreover, her baby will be healthy. Good. Another meaning of this dream is that it shows that he will get rid of the bad thoughts that he often thinks about. If the abaya is white, this is an indication that she has achieved her goals. If she sees herself wearing a new abaya, this indicates a benefit that will accrue to her and her family. And if she sees the black abaya In a dream, this is a sign that she will be tired during childbirth. Or a sign of a problem with her husband in the coming days. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a man wearing women’s clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an abaya in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream wearing an abaya has many implications. Indicators and indications that could be very promising for her, we mention among them: May God Almighty grant her success and reward her well in her coming days. Also, seeing the abaya indicates that she will realize

title: Interpretation of wearing a necklace in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of wearing a necklace in a dream on different occasions. A woman’s beauty means a lot to her, and her longing to appear in her best shape may be what she thinks about most. The dream carries many interpretations, learn about them through this encyclopedia article with some details. Interpretation of wearing a necklace in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a necklace of pearl beads as an indicator of the dreamer’s personality in faith and piety, the contracts or covenants that he will fulfill, God willing. Ibn Sirin adds that a single person who sees himself wearing a necklace in a dream is a sign for him that his marriage is approaching, God willing, with a woman who carries the Qur’an and is good at observing and working. Its provisions. Ibn Shirin indicates that in the event of a breach of the contract by the Prophet who memorized the Qur’an, this is a sign of his forgetfulness, and if he had a covenant or contract that he did not fulfill or complete. Wearing a necklace in a dream for a single woman: Ibn Sirin explains that if an unmarried girl sees herself As she wears a necklace or carries a necklace on her chest, this is a sign that she will meet a man who knows how beautiful she is and loves that beauty, but does not care about reason or wisdom, and perhaps marry him. Ibn Sirin says that if an unmarried woman pulls a necklace in a dream, this is a sign However, this girl has great personal strength and also tries to impose her control on those with them or around her. In the event that an unmarried woman throws the necklace in a far place by force, her beauty and age will go with a brutal man who does not appreciate her and does not realize her value. Wearing a necklace in a dream for a woman Married: Concerning a married woman, Ibn Sirin says that if she dreams that she wears a necklace and flaunts it in front of people, then the necklace here is a sign of her husband who will make her flaunt it and brag about it. Love in front of people, and it is also a sign of her husband’s sincerity and faith in her. But if a married woman sees that her husband gave her a necklace to wear in a dream, and if that necklace is studded with diamonds, then this is good news for her about the strength of his love for her to the extent that he prefers. Above himself and prefers it to himself. Wearing a necklace in a dream for a pregnant woman: Ibn Sirin heralds good news to the woman who finds in her dream that she is wearing a necklace, that the fetus she is carrying in her womb will be remembered, God Almighty willing, and her seeing the necklace indicates that it is very beautiful. This newborn will be characterized by beauty in appearance and character. Wearing a necklace in a dream for a man: As for the man, Ibn Sirin believes that a single person who sees himself wearing a necklace in a dream, this is good news for him that he will marry someone who carries the Holy Qur’an and fears God in him. Paying off debts and fulfilling vows to people. On the contrary, this dream could be an evil omen for its owner and a sign that he will be exposed to many problems and crises or that he will be affected by a disease if he wears an unoriginal or ugly necklace. Or if the necklace makes him choke. Interpretation of wearing a necklace in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi agrees with the scholar Ibn Sirin in seeing that wearing a necklace in a dream is a sign of the arrival of goodness and livelihood to the dreamer, especially if this necklace is characterized by its beautiful appearance and elegance.

Wearing a necklace in a dream for a pregnant woman: Ibn Sirin heralds good news to the woman who finds in her dream that she is wearing a necklace, that the fetus she is carrying in her womb will be remembered, God Almighty willing, and her seeing the necklace indicates that it is very beautiful. This newborn will be characterized by beauty in appearance and character. Wearing a necklace in a dream for a man: As for the man, Ibn Sirin believes that a single person who sees himself wearing a necklace in a dream, this is good news for him that he will marry someone who carries the Holy Qur’an and fears God in him. Paying off debts and fulfilling vows to people. On the contrary, this dream could be an evil omen for its owner and a sign that he will be exposed to many problems and crises or that he will be affected by a disease if he wears an unoriginal or ugly necklace. Or if the necklace makes him choke. Interpretation of wearing a necklace in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi agrees with the scholar Ibn Sirin in seeing that wearing a necklace in a dream is a sign of the arrival of goodness and livelihood to the dreamer, especially if this necklace is characterized by its beautiful appearance and elegance.
